tasks.title: Define core contracts (IDs, DTOs, domain events)
tasks.description: Create the SSoT C# contracts for the T2 loop: IDs, DTOs, and domain event types (CloudEvents-style constants) for gathering/crafting/combat/map/offline/DLC.
tasks.details: Add/extend files under `Game.Core/Contracts/**` (no Godot dependencies). Include event type constants following `${DOMAIN_PREFIX}.<entity>.<action>` and stable ID types/aliases for ItemId, SkillId, NodeId, RecipeId, EnemyId, RegionId, QuestId, AchievementId, DlcId. Reference ADR-0004 (event bus and contracts).
tasks.testStrategy: Add xUnit contract tests validating event type strings and DTO defaults/serialization-ready shapes.

tasks.title: Define Core ports (time, RNG, datastore, event bus, content)
tasks.description: Introduce Core interfaces for deterministic logic and adapter isolation.
tasks.details: Add `Game.Core/Ports/**` interfaces: `IClock`, `IRng`, `IDataStore`, `IEventBus`, `IContentProvider`, and any small helper abstractions needed to keep `Game.Core` engine-free. Reference ADR-0007 (ports/adapters).
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit tests compile-only and minimal fakes verifying determinism (e.g., seeded RNG) and that Core services accept injected ports.

tasks.title: Implement deterministic RNG service in Game.Core
tasks.description: Provide a seeded RNG implementation to support reproducible drops and tests.
tasks.details: Implement `IRng` with a seedable algorithm and helper methods for weighted selection. Keep API minimal and deterministic. Ensure no Godot dependencies.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit: same seed yields identical sequences; weighted selection is stable under fixed seed; boundary cases (empty tables) throw predictable exceptions.

tasks.title: Define GameState snapshot + versioning + migration hooks
tasks.description: Create a versioned save snapshot representing the full player state for T2.
tasks.details: Add `Game.Core` save DTOs for skills/exp, inventory/equipment, region unlocks, quest progress, enabled DLCs, lastOnlineTime, and schema/version fields. Provide a small migration entrypoint to bump versions safely. Reference ADR-0006 (data storage) and base docs CH05.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit: round-trip JSON serialization; migration from previous version adds missing defaults; lastOnlineTime handling is stable in UTC.

tasks.title: Implement InventoryManager (stacking, equipment, stats aggregation)
tasks.description: Build Core inventory and equipment rules needed for crafting and combat.
tasks.details: Implement inventory add/remove/stack rules, basic equipment slots, and an aggregate function producing final combat stats. Keep pure logic in `Game.Core` and model definitions in contracts.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit: stacking rules; insufficient materials; equip/unequip updates stats; deterministic ordering for UI-friendly display.

tasks.title: Implement SkillManager (EXP, levels, milestones, unlock hooks)
tasks.description: Provide skill progression and unlock checks for gathering/crafting/map.
tasks.details: Implement exp gain, level calculation, milestone events, and unlock predicates. Keep thresholds data-driven via content provider (later).
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit: exp-to-level math; milestone triggers at defined levels; unlock predicates are correct for edge levels.

tasks.title: Implement ActivitySystem (start/stop/tick) for gather/craft/combat
tasks.description: Create the unified activity orchestrator that is driven by TimeService ticks.
tasks.details: Implement a state machine for current activity, tick processing, and event emission (e.g., item gained, exp gained). Ensure activities are engine-free and controlled via injected ports.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit: start/stop transitions; tick accumulation; switching activity stops previous; events emitted in correct order.

tasks.title: Implement Gathering loop (2-3 skills) with nodes and yields
tasks.description: Ship the minimal gathering loop with periodic yields and skill XP.
tasks.details: Implement gather node definitions (required level, base cycle, yields) and integrate into ActivitySystem. Start with 2-3 skills (e.g., mining/woodcutting/fishing) using data-driven content IDs.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit: cycle timing; yield amounts; required level enforcement; exp gain per cycle; inventory updates.

tasks.title: Implement weighted drop tables + rare drop notifications
tasks.description: Support rare drops for gathering and combat with UI-friendly event payloads.
tasks.details: Create drop table utilities (weighted choice, multi-drop roll) and define an event for 'rare drop obtained' with a display hint for the UI.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit: fixed-seed rare drop reproducibility; probability table validation; event payload includes item id and source context.

tasks.title: Implement CraftingManager (recipes, material checks, outputs, XP)
tasks.description: Enable converting gathered materials into items/equipment/consumables.
tasks.details: Implement recipe validation, material deduction, outputs creation, and crafting XP. Keep recipes data-driven via content IDs.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit: missing materials; exact materials; multiple outputs; crafting XP; idempotent failure without side effects.

tasks.title: Implement CombatManager core loop (auto battle state machine)
tasks.description: Provide an engine-free combat loop supporting auto attacks, win/loss, and drops.
tasks.details: Implement combat state, attack interval ticks, HP updates, victory/defeat determination, and event emission. Keep enemy stats/data-driven.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit: deterministic outcomes under fixed seed and fixed stats; win/loss edges; state transitions; event ordering.

tasks.title: Implement DamageCalculator (pure function/service)
tasks.description: Create a testable damage calculation component used by CombatManager.
tasks.details: Implement base damage, defense mitigation, crit chance, and optional modifiers. Keep it pure and configurable via stats and tuning parameters.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit: known input yields known output; crit math reproducible with injected RNG; clamp rules (no negative damage).

tasks.title: Implement LootGenerator (combat rewards: gold, items, rare rolls)
tasks.description: Generate post-combat rewards via drop tables.
tasks.details: Implement weighted loot roll based on enemy/region tables, including gold and rare drops. Integrate with CombatManager end-state.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit: fixed seed yields stable loot; empty table behavior; rare drop signal emitted for UI.

tasks.title: Implement MapManager (regions, unlock conditions, region content)
tasks.description: Support world progression with region unlock rules and content routing.
tasks.details: Implement region definitions (requirements: skill level, boss kill, quest completion, etc.) and unlocking. Provide queries for UI: locked reason, available activities per region.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit: unlock predicates; locked reason text keys; region transitions persist to GameState.

tasks.title: Implement QuestManager (state machine driven by domain events)
tasks.description: Provide minimal quest chain support for T2 progression.
tasks.details: Implement quest states (not accepted/in progress/completed/reward claimed) and event-driven objectives (e.g., gather X, craft Y, defeat boss). Reference ADR-0004 for event-driven progression.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit: quest progresses on events; reward claim idempotence; persistence to GameState; invalid transitions rejected.

tasks.title: Implement AchievementTracker (event-driven unlocks)
tasks.description: Track achievements for long-term goals and feedback.
tasks.details: Implement achievement checks and persistence. Use domain events as inputs; keep core logic pure.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit: achievement unlock on thresholds; no double-unlock; persistence across saves.

tasks.title: Implement DlcManager + DLC manifest contract
tasks.description: Add the minimal DLC system for visibility, gating, and content linking.
tasks.details: Define DLC manifest model (id, enabled, regions/items/recipes hooks). Implement DlcManager for enabling/disabling and cross-link rules (DLC resources usable by base recipes and vice versa).
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit: enabling DLC registers content; DLC-disabled region remains locked with correct reason; cross-link rules are enforced.

tasks.title: Create content schemas + minimal JSON content set (base)
tasks.description: Establish the data-driven content format and provide starter base content.
tasks.details: Define JSON schemas (documented, not necessarily JSONSchema) for items, skills, nodes, recipes, enemies, regions, quests, achievements. Create a minimal base content set sufficient for the T2 loop and reference IDs from Core.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests validate content loading parses and all referenced IDs exist (no dangling references).

tasks.title: Implement safe ContentProvider (res:// only, allowlist, validation)
tasks.description: Load and validate content data at runtime with security constraints.
tasks.details: Implement `IContentProvider` in adapter layer using Godot `FileAccess`/`ResourceLoader` (or pure file reads if already allowed) with path normalization (res:// only) and extension allowlist. Reference ADR-0019 (security baseline).
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit for pure parsing/validation; GdUnit4 or headless integration test ensures res:// paths load and invalid paths are rejected with audit.

tasks.title: Define IDataStore save/load contract and Core persistence workflow
tasks.description: Centralize save/load in Core and keep engine I/O in adapters.
tasks.details: Implement the Core workflow: `Load -> Migrate -> Apply -> Save` and expose minimal commands for UI. Do not perform file I/O in Core.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit with an in-memory fake IDataStore verifying migrations and lastOnlineTime updates; failure cases produce structured error results.

tasks.title: Implement SQLite-backed DataStore adapter with schema_version table
tasks.description: Persist save state and game data using SQLite with versioning.
tasks.details: Implement adapter using `Microsoft.Data.Sqlite` (and/or plugin path if present) writing under `user://`. Maintain `schema_version` table and backups if required by ADR-0006.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit for repository-level logic (no Godot); integration test writes to a temp user:// path and confirms schema_version and save rows exist; log outputs follow logs/SSoT.

tasks.title: Enforce security baseline (URL allowlist, file path policy, offline mode)
tasks.description: Implement defensive controls required by the repo security baseline.
tasks.details: Centralize external URL opening and outbound network checks. Enforce res:// read-only and user:// read/write only. Add audit JSONL entries with {ts, action, reason, target, caller}. Reference ADR-0019.
tasks.testStrategy: Security smoke tests: allow/deny/invalid URL cases; absolute/escape path writes denied; GD_OFFLINE_MODE=1 blocks all outbound actions and records audits.

tasks.title: Implement structured Logger adapter (Core-friendly, file sink)
tasks.description: Provide structured logging usable from Core and adapters.
tasks.details: Implement adapter writing structured logs under `user://logs/**` with minimal fields (ts, level, area, msg, context). Keep log I/O in adapter layer. Reference ADR-0003 (observability).
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests validate JSON serialization and log sampling behavior; integration test writes one log line and verifies file created.

tasks.title: Implement EventBus adapter (Core events -> Godot signals)
tasks.description: Wire Core domain events to the Godot scene layer in a consistent way.
tasks.details: Implement `IEventBus` in adapters; expose typed subscribe/publish in Core; bridge to Godot signals for UI listeners. Reference ADR-0004.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit with fake subscribers; GdUnit4 ensures signals are emitted on publish and carry expected payloads.

tasks.title: Implement TimeService adapter and game tick loop integration
tasks.description: Drive ActivitySystem ticks deterministically and support offline calculation.
tasks.details: Implement `IClock` adapter over Godot time APIs and a central tick in `CompositionRoot` calling `ActivitySystem.Tick(delta)`. Provide hooks for offline delta calculation at load time.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit for delta math and clamping; GdUnit4 ensures ticks advance activity and UI updates reflect changes.

tasks.title: Create CompositionRoot wiring (DI, adapters, Core services)
tasks.description: Establish runtime wiring between Godot autoloads and Core services.
tasks.details: Build a composition root that constructs Core managers (skill/inventory/activity/combat/map/quest/DLC) and injects adapters (clock/rng/datastore/eventbus/content/logger). Keep singletons explicit and minimal.
tasks.testStrategy: Headless smoke: project boots and loads main scene without exceptions; logs record baseline info.

tasks.title: Implement MainScene flow (new game, continue, save on exit)
tasks.description: Provide the entry flow to start/continue a save and ensure persistence.
tasks.details: Add UI buttons and wiring to load/save via Core persistence workflow. On exit, persist lastOnlineTime and current state.
tasks.testStrategy: GdUnit4: boot -> new game -> save -> reload -> state persists; produces logs/e2e summary.

tasks.title: Implement SkillScreen (overview + navigation to activities)
tasks.description: Create a central dashboard-style screen listing skills and entry points.
tasks.details: Build a Control-based screen showing skill levels and buttons to gathering/crafting/combat/map/inventory/quests.
tasks.testStrategy: GdUnit4: screen is visible; key nodes exist; navigation signals are emitted and routed.

tasks.title: Implement GatheringScreen UI (select node, start/stop, show yields)
tasks.description: Expose gathering selection and live yield feedback to the player.
tasks.details: Build UI to choose skill and node, start/stop gathering, display last yields and rare drop highlight. Consume events from EventBus.
tasks.testStrategy: GdUnit4: start gathering emits events; UI updates inventory counts; rare drop event triggers highlight node.

tasks.title: Implement CraftingScreen UI (select recipe, craft, show results)
tasks.description: Expose crafting selection and feedback (materials, outputs, XP).
tasks.details: Build recipe list with filters, show required materials and craft button. Consume crafting events and update inventory display.
tasks.testStrategy: GdUnit4: crafting disabled when materials missing; crafting consumes materials and adds outputs; XP UI updates.

tasks.title: Implement CombatScreen UI (start/stop, HP, loot summary)
tasks.description: Provide a minimal auto combat UX with readable feedback.
tasks.details: Build UI to select region/enemy, start combat, display HP and outcome, and show loot summary. Ensure start/stop is safe and idempotent.
tasks.testStrategy: GdUnit4: start combat transitions state; win emits loot events; stop cancels combat; no exceptions on rapid toggles.

tasks.title: Implement InventoryScreen UI (items, equipment, stats)
tasks.description: Expose inventory management and equipment changes.
tasks.details: Build item list, equipment slots, and derived stat panel. Wire equip/unequip commands to Core and reflect results.
tasks.testStrategy: GdUnit4: equip updates stats panel; inventory list reflects counts; invalid equip shows error and logs it.

tasks.title: Implement QuestScreen UI (quest chain + reward claim)
tasks.description: Show quests and allow claiming rewards for completed objectives.
tasks.details: Build quest list with status, objective progress, and claim button. Use event-driven updates from Core.
tasks.testStrategy: GdUnit4: progress updates on gather/craft/combat events; claim changes state and adds rewards; claim is idempotent.

tasks.title: Implement MapScreen UI (regions, unlock reasons, DLC indicators)
tasks.description: Provide map progression UI with clear locked reasons and DLC gating.
tasks.details: Build region list/map, show unlock requirements and state. When DLC region is present but disabled, show locked marker and explanation. Reference ADR-0010 for i18n readiness (use string keys).
tasks.testStrategy: GdUnit4: locked regions show correct reasons; unlocking via requirements changes UI state; DLC disabled shows expected lock UI.

tasks.title: Implement OfflineCalculator + OfflineRewardDialog
tasks.description: Calculate offline gains and present a single settlement dialog on return.
tasks.details: Implement offline delta calculation (clamped by tunables), apply rewards via Core managers, emit OfflineRewardGranted event, and show dialog summarizing results.
tasks.testStrategy: xUnit: offline delta clamping and reward math; GdUnit4: returning from saved state shows one dialog and then dismisses cleanly.

tasks.title: Integrate Sentry (early init, release sessions, crash-free gate inputs)
tasks.description: Enable observability per repo baseline (Sentry Releases + Sessions).
tasks.details: Initialize Sentry SDK in earliest Autoload, set release/environment, capture exceptions from adapters, and ensure structured context fields are sanitized. Reference ADR-0003.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration smoke: SDK initializes without errors in headless mode; logs show Sentry init; (CI) release-health script produces `release-health.json` artifact.

tasks.title: Add PerformanceTracker (startup timing, frame p95 sampling)
tasks.description: Collect perf signals required by soft gates and future hard gates.
tasks.details: Implement sampling for startup time and frame time p95, output `logs/perf/**/summary.json` per repo SSoT. Reference ADR-0015 (performance budgets and gates).
tasks.testStrategy: Headless perf smoke produces summary JSON; thresholds configurable via env vars; no engine exceptions when disabled.

tasks.title: Add Core unit test coverage suite for T2 loop invariants
tasks.description: Ensure Core logic is covered by xUnit with stable gates.
tasks.details: Add focused xUnit tests for the loop invariants: exp curves, drop reproducibility, crafting material accounting, combat win/loss, region unlocks, offline settlement. Keep tests fast and deterministic.
tasks.testStrategy: Run `dotnet test --collect:"XPlat Code Coverage"` and verify coverage gates (lines/branches) per docs/testing-framework.md.

tasks.title: Add GdUnit4 headless smoke suite (boot, main scene, key signals)
tasks.description: Create engine-level smoke tests verifying scenes and signals wiring.
tasks.details: Implement GdUnit4 suites for booting the project headless, loading MainScene, and validating key signals/event routing. Output JUnit/XML and JSON summaries under `logs/e2e/**`.
tasks.testStrategy: Run headless Godot tests locally and in CI; verify artifacts are created and failures are actionable.

tasks.title: Add security smoke suite (URL/network/file allow/deny + audit verification)
tasks.description: Verify security baseline controls and audit outputs end-to-end.
tasks.details: Implement tests that cover: allowed https host, denied host, invalid scheme, offline mode deny-all, user:// write allowed, absolute path denied, traversal denied. Ensure audits are written as JSONL. Reference ADR-0019.
tasks.testStrategy: Headless security suite that asserts both behavior and audit file contents (entries count and reasons).

tasks.title: Wire quality gates scripts (typecheck, lint, unit, scene, security, perf)
tasks.description: Ensure a single Windows-friendly command can run all project gates.
tasks.details: Update/validate `scripts/python/quality_gates.py` and related helpers to run: `dotnet build -warnaserror`, `dotnet test`, headless Godot suites (smoke/security/perf), and task-links validation. Reference ADR-0005 (quality gates).
tasks.testStrategy: Run the full gate command locally; confirm logs are written under `logs/ci/<date>/` and failures stop the pipeline.

tasks.title: Create minimal base world progression content (regions, boss, quest chain)
tasks.description: Add enough content to support the T2 loop end-to-end in the base world.
tasks.details: Add 1-2 base regions, 1 boss enemy, a small loot table, and a short quest chain that requires gathering -> crafting -> boss kill -> region unlock. Keep everything data-driven and consistent with IDs.
tasks.testStrategy: Automated content validation + one headless scene test that simulates the quest chain triggers via Core calls and verifies region unlock event.

tasks.title: Create minimal DLC content (region, node, recipe, passive) + manifest
tasks.description: Add a DLC region that is visible, gated, enterable, and linked to base content.
tasks.details: Add 1 DLC region, 1 gather node, 1 recipe that uses DLC material and benefits base gameplay, and 1 passive reward usable in base world. Ensure DLC manifest drives gating and linking.
tasks.testStrategy: Headless test toggles DLC on/off: verifies visibility, lock reason, and that DLC material can be used in a base recipe when enabled.

tasks.title: End-to-end playable loop verification (new save -> unlock -> DLC link)
tasks.description: Validate the full T2 loop is playable and produces expected logs/artifacts.
tasks.details: Run the project, complete the loop: new save -> gather -> craft -> combat -> unlock region -> enable DLC -> enter DLC region -> use DLC material in base. Capture gate outputs and confirm no invalid links in docs index.
tasks.testStrategy: Record a reproducible checklist and ensure CI smoke/security/perf suites pass; artifacts exist under logs/ per repo SSoT.

tasks.title: Documentation alignment (index + Test-Refs + ADR references for T2 loop)
tasks.description: Keep docs aligned with implementation and tests without stale project semantics.
tasks.details: Update `docs/PROJECT_DOCUMENTATION_INDEX.md` and relevant overlay docs to link to the new tests, contracts, and gates. Ensure any new module/threshold changes reference accepted ADRs or add a Proposed ADR if needed.
tasks.testStrategy: Run `py -3 scripts/python/task_links_validate.py` and confirm all doc links and Test-Refs resolve.
